subtitleNullable: PHEME dataset for Rumour Detection and Veracity Classification
descriptionNullable:
### Context

This dataset contains a collection of Twitter rumours and non-rumours posted during breaking news. It contains rumours related to 9 events and each of the rumours is annotated with its veracity value, either True, False or Unverified.


### Acknowledgements

https://github.com/kochkinaelena/Multitask4Veracity
https://www.aclweb.org/anthology/C18-1288/
https://figshare.com/articles/dataset/PHEME_dataset_for_Rumour_Detection_and_Veracity_Classification/6392078
